column6:
With the Dark X-Men subdued, you would think New Excalibur would have smooth sailing. THINK AGAIN! Lionheart (from AVENGERS) and her new mysterious master plan on making their lives a living hell. Part 2 (of 2)!,2006,3
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | penciller:Steven Cummings | letterer:Tom Orzechowski | colorist:Peter Pantazis | penciller (cover):Michael Ryan
